name: IPv4 Validation
description: Simple good choice, validate all matches over the limitation of ipv4.
content:
# What happens?
255 to 250 or 24X to 20x or 1XX|0XX|XX|X tree times with dot '.', and one more time but without dot

# Works
255.255.255.255 255.255.255.255
  5.255.255.255 255.255.255.2
    5.5.255.255 255.255.2.2
      5.5.5.255 255.2.2.2

# Fail vs example correction
1000.0.0.0   100.0.0.0
355.0.0.0     35.0.0.0
265.0.0.0    165.0.0.0
256.0.0.0    156.0.0.0
255.0.0.     255.0.0.1
.0.0.0        10.0.0.0
255..0.0     255.9.0.0

# As mask to mask
255.8.8.* 255.8.*.* 10.*.*.*
*.*.*.*  # removes '\b' to see this working.

# You can use ^$ too, but for explanation purpose I avoid this
# If You dont want *, remove "|\*"
author: Voiski
